item.title: Using Grafana Agent to proxy AWS Kinesis Data Firehose in to Grafana Loki
item.description: Running workloads on AWS EKS with EC2 instances is straightforward and something that you just do with out thinking much about it. Now if you switch to use Fargate, then there is a whole set of other things you need to think about and skills to pick up. One of those things is logging. So I’ve been experimenting with Kinesis Data Firehose and Grafana Agent, to get a flow of logs in to Grafana Loki.
